# J.J. Rodríguez

**Philosophy** — German Idealism (Kant, Fichte, Schelling, Hegel); political philosophy; metaphysics of freedom; realism vs. constructivism; bridges to contemporary epistemology.

Welcome! I research and teach German Classical Philosophy at Charles University in Prague with a focus on freedom, metaphysics, and the relation between **system and Being**, especially in **Schelling** and his legacy for current debates about politics, science and knowledge.

::: callout
